dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy

T.-T. Ng

dcterms:description: A large-scale skeleton-based action recognition dataset with over 60 action classes of 40 subjects for indoor scenarios, captured by three Kinect v.2 cameras in three views.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 60

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: An extension of the NTU RGB+D 60 dataset with 60 extra action classes, resulting in a total of 120 action classes for 106 subjects.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120

dcterms:creator: W. Kay
J. Carreira
K. Simonyan

A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: A skeleton-based action recognition dataset converted from the Kinetics 400 video dataset using the OpenPose toolbox in 2D keypoints modality.
dcterms:title: Kinetics Skeleton 400
